entries.abort: We are already a mess and you are leaving us! Pirates have been detected in this area.
entries.arrival_phase_1: Getting a lock on the disabled ship and sending the location to your nav computer. Assist that ship with repairs and escort it to HQ.
entries.arrival_phase_2: The disabled vessel just limped into the sector. Assist with repairs and escort her home.
entries.complete: Nice work, pilot. We have her safe and sound. Report your success back to your superior or remain in the area to be assigned another vessel to rescue.
entries.complete_1: Nice work, pilot. We have her safe and sound. Report your success back to your superior.
entries.docking_complete: Repairs completed. Escort the ship back to HQ.
entries.docking_started: Docking procedure started. Once repairs are completed escort her home.
entries.failed_destroy: We wanted that ship back in one piece. Report your failure to your commander.
entries.panic_1: It looks like those Red Skulls are coming back to finish the job.
entries.panic_3: I am going to be useless in this fight. They are all yours.
entries.panic_5: Look out! Pirates coming in at twelve o'clock.
entries.quest_dock_d: Once you have located the damage vessel, target it and press the 'U' key to assist the transport with repairs. The vessel will be able to get underway shortly after you help it.
entries.quest_dock_t: Assisting the Imperial Transport with Repairs
entries.quest_escort_d: After the vessel is underway, follow it and make sure that it arrives at a safe jump location without incident. Reports of Rebel activity show that there is a high chance they will attack the vessel, so be alert and ready to defend the transport.
entries.quest_location_d: Travel to the Endor system and follow the supplied navigation waypoint to the damaged transport.
entries.recovery_success: Stand by, pilot. She is on final approach.
entries.rescue_phase_1_1: Glad to see someone other then those pirates. They have been coming back taunting me every few minutes.
entries.rescue_phase_1_2: I will try to get my engine back online so we can get out of here.
entries.rescue_phase_1_3: Those pirates took my engine out and then took off. I think you spooked them.
entries.rescue_phase_1_4: Not sure if I can get my engine restarted but I will try.
entries.rescue_phase_1_5: You scared off those pirates. Let me see if I can get restarted and get out of here.
entries.rescue_phase_2_1: My engine is back online. Follow me!
entries.rescue_phase_2_2: Ok, she started but I don't know how long she will last.
entries.rescue_phase_2_3: I just completed my repairs. Let's get out of here.
entries.rescue_phase_2_4: Wow, that was lucky. I wasn't damaged as bad as I first thought. Follow me.
entries.rescue_phase_2_5: The repairs have been completed. Follow me out of here.
entries.taunt_1: Try running. You might actually make it.
entries.taunt_2: Give us the freighter and no one gets hurt.
entries.taunt_3: You have crossed the wrong pilot this time.
entries.taunt_4: I was going to let you live but now you are mine!
entries.taunt_5: That's it. No more mister nice guy.
entries.thanks_1: Wow, you took all those ships out. You are good.
entries.thanks_2: What happened? I wasn't paying attention.
entries.thanks_3: Hey, you destroyed them all. Nice work.
entries.thanks_4: Yeah that was all me. They couldn't handle my extreme skills.
entries.thanks_5: How do I become an Imperial pilot?
entries.title: Endor System: Rescue the Imperial Transports Duty
entries.title_d: Travel to the Endor system and rescue the damaged Imperial transports. Once you arrive in the Endor system, you will receive a navigation waypoint to the location of a damaged transport. Travel to the location and press the 'U' key or type /dock to assist the transport with repairs. Once the vessel is repaired escort it through the system to safety. Once the transport is safely away, you will receive a new navigation waypoint to another transport in need of assistance. This is a duty mission and can be quit at any time. Simply abort the mission or leave the system to end the mission.
